passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(10) > div > section > header:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(11) > footer:nth-child(2) > section > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(11) > footer:nth-child(2) > section > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(11) > footer:nth-child(2) > section > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(3) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(11) > footer:nth-child(2) > section > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(4) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(11) > footer:nth-child(2) > section > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(5) > h2:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid
